--- product_code: ls09 description: 10mm German Falkonet (Horse-drawn Cannons) title: 10mm German Falkonet (Horse-drawn Cannons) breadcrumb: Falkonet (Horse-drawn Cannons) name: German Falkonet (Horse-drawn Cannons) cost: $13.00 paypal_id: SLBU78QJJB8AU ---

Falkonets were light cannons with a caliber of around 5cm that could be redeployed with a single galloping horse.

This is a Falkonet (Horse-drawn Cannons) unit of two horse-drawn cannons and six crew. You will recieve two cannon barrels (ls09a), two gun carriages (ls_b), two limbers (ls09b), eight spoked wheels (ls_c) and six crew (one each of ls09c–d, and a mix of four ls15a–i).
